com.viaoa.jsp
Class OAServletImage

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.jsp.OAHtmlElement
      com.viaoa.jsp.OAServletImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
OAJspComponent, java.io.Serializable
public class OAServletImage
extends OAHtmlElement

Controls an html img "src" attribute, to use an image using the ImageSerlvet Example: if image is in object Employee.ImageStore.bytes OAImage(hubEmployee, Employee.PROPERTY_EmpImageStore); this will change the to use the "/servlet/img" url

Author:
vvia
See Also:
Serialized Form
